title: Streamlining Code Review
description: Worked on Googles internal code review platform, always trying to optimize for user satisfaction and efficiency. Planned and reviewed features based on usage statistics. Oversaw deployment and supported users.

title: Code Review IDE Integration
description: Integrating code review artifacts into the VSCode based IDE to make it easier and faster to work on code feedback.

title: Insurance Calculator
description: Developed an online insurance calculator where users can browse and select their individual health insurance.

title: Modernize the Ticket Vending Machine
description: Technological redevelopment of the ticket vending machine to match the app UI, providing outstanding accessibility and uptime.

title: Custom Tracking Library
description: Developed cross-browser compatible library to track user behavour and displayed contents.

title: Mobile Security Training Quiz
description: Mobile-first, card-based quiz which let's users playfully learn about security topics.

title: Technological Research in AR & VR
description: AR prototype to overlook and maintain conveyor belts in a factory. Analyzing its performance with a user-study.

title: Car Interior Control System Prototype
description: Exploratory development of an Android app to control interior functionality to simplify usage and improve user satisfaction.

title: Smart Home Control
description: Web-based app to interact with a smart home system.

title: In-Car VR Experience Prototype
description: Researched and implemented an in-car VR experience using live vehicle data. Tested user acceptance of the concept.
